p: The majority of the Tetraclinaie area of Morocco is located in the semiarid bioclimatic floor with a moderate, gentle, fiery variant. They can also grow in the subhumid with a warm, mild, or temperate variant on filterable soils, on dense slopes or on hot lights [ 4]. It has always been used in folk medicine due to its varied therapeutic effects; it is more used against intestinal and respiratory infections also against skin infections [ 5, 6].
